alert.note: Alert for Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 4:26AM EDT until May 01 at 9:39PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Tunkhannock Creek At Tunkhannock affecting Wyoming County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tunkhannock Creek At Tunkhannock. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Cozy Creek Family Campground becomes flooded at this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 9.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 11.6 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
